channel.title: Sponserd on mopar [ Question ]
channel.description:
Can someone tell me a quick brief of the sponser
Once bidding and if you manage to be in the top 10 , Does your sponser show on the 10th ( tomorrow ) or next month on the 10th ?
As i was wondering if you get shown from the 10th of the month you bid on or the following?
Thanks alot and sorry if this is not allowed in this section .
~ Blast
